Text: Did you use the old High Resolution Texture Pack or the new one?
This is in russian?? :( damn is there anyway to get it to play in english?
plz tell me how to change this to english
Is it possible to change to english? Thanks dude!!!
Russian... Figured out that during the install you can change that to English in the drop down list.

Guys, all you need to do is, when installer opens, click next next (or.. whorever) till you reach the options part. You will see there voice language, audio language or smthing like that and in left part of each one, you'll have a little cross(...) click it and it will open lang's. Switch to english and you're done. Sry 4 my English ^^
I installed the English version, but for some reason there is absolutely no sound in game. At all.
***If you are having sound problems you need to install Microsoft DirectX.. Google it, Hope this helps ^_^
